title: Fougasse with chickpea and olive oil purée, pesto and tapenade
description: Bread expert Richard Bertinet gives his recipe for fougasse bread and homemade dips.
ingredients: 10g/¼oz fresh yeast (or 1 x 7g sachet fast action yeast)
350g/12oz water (weighing the water is more accurate)
1 x 400g/14oz tinned chickpeas, drained and rinsed well
